Title: silverstripe/framework has Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in RedirectorPage
Description: RedirectorPage will allow users to specify a non-url malicious script as the redirection path without validation. Users which follow this url may allow this script to execute within their browser.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.4.0-rc1 before 3.4.6, all versions starting from 3.5.0-rc1 before 3.5.4
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.4.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.4.6 before 3.5.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.5.4
